dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Sony for tvsdepot.com [1]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 16, 2007 2:50 PM
To: Response, Legal
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Sony for tvsdepot.com [1]

Thank you for your response and attention to this matter.  The following
URLs are infringing on Sony Home Audio's intellectual property with
respect to text:

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_70350_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_28562_Sony.html

Thank you again

Victor Tarver
LMS Representative
Net Enforcers Inc.
VTarver@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: Response, Legal [mailto:legalresponse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 13, 2007 3:19 PM
To: Victor Tarver
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Sony for tvsdepot.com [1]

Please provide us with the specific URL which is infringing upon your
client's copyright. Thank you for working with us.

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 13, 2007 11:03 AM
To: Response, Legal
Cc: sales@tvsdepot.com
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Sony for tvsdepot.com [1]

The Planet,

Thank you for your response and attention to this matter.  The material
that is infringing on the DMCA with respect to Sony Home Audio is the
copyrighted text.  Please have your client, tvsdepot.com, remove all
copyrighted material from their site (text, images, and Sony
trademarks).

Victor Tarver
LMS Representative
Net Enforcers Inc.
VTarver@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Monday, April 02, 2007 11:51 AM
To: Victor Tarver; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Sony for tvsdepot.com [1]

We are unable to locate on the web page tvsdepot.com any of the material
that you claim is being infringed as of 10:37 AM --500 (Central Daylight
Time), Monday, April 02  2007.


---------


From: Victor Tarver [mailto:vtarver@netenforcers.com]
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2007 2:03 PM
To: sales@tvsdepot.com
Cc: Response, Legal
Subject: RE: [Ticket#2007031610001272] DMCA Complaint from Sony for
tvsdepot.com [1]


Tvsdepot.com,


Thank you for removing all of Sony Home Audio's logos and copyrighted
images from the urls provided, but in order to comply fully all of the
copyrighted images, text and/or trademarked logos of Sony Home Audio
needs to be removed from your entire website. I have posted the
remaining infringing URLs below. This case will remain open until this
request is satisfied in full. If you should need any further assistance
in reaching compliance please let me know and I will do my best to
provide you with the needed information.

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_15226_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_28562_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_52204_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_28708_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_28710_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_28748_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_28746_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_17890_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_18452_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_28742_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_81218_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_70350_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_69540_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_15226_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_52194_Sony.html

http://www.tvsdepot.com/product_52188_Sony.html

Thank you,


Victor Tarver
LMS Representative
Net Enforcers Inc.
VTarver@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality

and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be
legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received

this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended

dmca.principal_name: Net Enforcers Inc. (for Sony Home Audio)
